lines.text: But you can't, an Indian sheriff? Only ones elected in this country are Americans.
My father was born here, in the mountains. His father before him and his father before him and his father before him. Where was your father born?
Ulp, what's that to do with it?
I said, where was he born?
My father was born here, in America. His father before him and his father before him and his father before him. Now which of us is American?
